questions.question: I’m hungry now because I didn’t eat dinner.

choices.answer: If I had eaten dinner, I wouldn’t be hungry now.
I wanted to eat dinner if I had had the time.
I would have eaten dinner before, if I had the time.

questions.question: The room is very hot now because you left the door open.

choices.answer: I wish I hasn't left the door open.
If you hadn't left the door open the room will not be hot
If you hadn’t left thedoor open, the room wouldn’t be hot

questions.question: I am tired this morning because I went to bed very late.

choices.answer: If I had gone to bed earlier, I wouldn't be so tired now.
I could have gone to bed earlier but I didn't.
I wish I had gone to bed earlier.

questions.question: I didn’t finish my report yesterday, so I can't go out this evening.

choices.answer: I could be going out if I'd finished the report.
If I had finished myreport yesterday, I could go out.
I would go out, if I'd finished my report yesterday.

questions.question: Anita is sick now because she didn’t take her medicine.

choices.answer: Anita wish she'd taken her medicine because she's sick now.
Anita would be sick now if she hadn't taken her medicine.
If Anita had taken her medicine, she wouldn’t be sick now.

questions.question: You didn’t tell the truth. I think you should have.

choices.answer: If I were you, I wouldhave told the truth.
If I had been you, I could have told the truth.
If I had told the truth, I would be you.

questions.question: If I could speak Japanese, I (spend) my holiday in Japan.

choices.answer: would rather
could spend
might spend
would spend

questions.question: If I had known Mr. Jamison was in hospital, I (send) him a note with flowers.

choices.answer: could have sent
would have sent
wouldn't have sent
might have sent

questions.question: It’s too bad it’s raining! If it (rain), we (can) go for a picnic.

choices.answer: weren't raining/ could
wasn't raining/could
is raining/couldn't

questions.question: I’m glad I have so many good friends. Life without friends (be) really boring.

choices.answer: is being
will be
is
would be

questions.question: Are you coming to the party? I don’t think so, but I (let) you know if I change my mind.

choices.answer: will let
let
would let
wouldn't let

questions.question: Jack proposed to Jane 20 years ago but she refused.  Now she is still single.

choices.answer: If Jane had accepted Jack's proposal, she wouldn't be single
Jane would have accepted Jack's proposal.
Jane might not be single, if she had not accepted Jack.
